title: Sanctuary Cities Continue To Grow Releasing Thousands of Criminals (NumbersUSA Action)
text: ( Source : NumbersUSA Action ) Updated: Wed, Oct 14th 2015 @ 3:57 pm EDT The number of jurisdictions with sanctuary policies for illegal aliens have risen to an estimated 340 from 276 in July, according to an updated CIS study. The refusal of
